alert.note: Alert for Orange; Osceola (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Orange and north central Osceola Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 300 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Orlando International Airport, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Wedgefield, Orlando International Airport, Avalon Park and Azalea Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for east central Florida.
